I purchased the large size. I am 5' 6" and 108 lbs. My waste is 30" and hip is 36. The waste seems to run kind of small in this collection. The legs of the large size are huge on me. It's not a problem, as I bought these for camping in the mountains where it gets pretty cold at night. These sweatpants are very soft and thick, very comfortable to sleep in. The waste band is sturdy and about 2.5" thick in lenght (not tight with plenty of room to grow). The elastic at the ankles also have plenty of room, not tight at all in the large size.
